description: Want to tell fantastic stories and create your own worlds and characters? The Bachelor of 3D Design and Animation from Torrens University Australia will give you the essential knowledge to take on a career in 3D design or animation for film, TV, games, advertising, information, education, and beyond.

The combination of a highly regarded business degree and a cutting-edge degree in design in your preferred field offers you the flexibility to pursue exciting and varied career paths. The Business and Design programme from Torrens University Australia gives you the knowledge and confidence to launch your own creative business or go after leading roles in established agencies.
The Bachelor of Arts (B.A.) in Music from Colorado State University allows students to study music within a larger context of a liberal education.
The Communication Design program at Texas State University is one of the largest public programs in the country and considered to be one of the best within the Southwest United States.

The goal of the Musical Theatre program at Texas State University is to provide holistic, customized training in musical theater performance to prepare you for the current professional market and develop professional artists who live with integrity in all aspects of their lives.

The Diploma in Liberal Arts from Australian Catholic University provides students from diverse backgrounds with a flexible one-year introduction to tertiary studies through the completion of 80 cp of Arts units.

course: Media and Communication with Foundation Year (Hons)
description: Do you love making film, TV or digital media? Do you have ambitions for a career in the media, but don’t meet the entry requirements for one of our Bachelor's degree programmes? If so, this BA (Hons) Media and Communication with Foundation Year degree course is ideal.
Have a hand in shaping the way the modern world works, learns, communicates, and plays with a Bachelor of Arts in Digital Media Design at the National University.

The Department of Art and Art History offers several options of study: The B.F.A. Art degree at Colorado State University with studio concentrations in Drawing, Electronic Arts, Fibers, Graphic Design, Metalsmithing, Painting,  Photo Image Making, Pottery, Printmaking, and Sculpture; and the B.F.A. degree with a concentration in Art Education.

Through this Digital Business, Design and Innovation program from EU Business School the entrepreneurial innovators of tomorrow will develop the skills, adaptability and curiosity to not just keep up with technological advances, but to be innovative in their thinking and drive change as they move forward in their careers.

If you are a passionate fan of visual effects and moving images, and you want to have a career in the film industry, the gaming field or in adverstising, then this basic and advanced BA/BSc in Visual Effects Animation (Hons) from SAE Institute Vienna provides a basis for launching a career in this part of the creative economy.
The Music - Creative Studies Emphasis program is offered by University of Arizona.
Students in the Visual Design certificate program at Full Sail University get an introduction to the language of design and gain experience with industry-standard tools used in creative projects.

course: Online Culture - Art, Media and Society
description: In the Bachelor’s program Online Culture - Art, Media and Society at Tilburg University you will study  art, media and culture in an increasingly digital, globalized world. In this program, you will learn to understand and interpret how digitalization and globalization influence our everyday lives, the artistic expressions we enjoy, and the ways in which we communicate.
Develop your craft and sharpen your skills as you prepare for a career in theatre arts during Theatre Arts at Liberty University.

The major in Graphic Design course at South Dakota State University prepares students for entry-level design positions. Professional graphic designers plan and execute designs for visual communication according to the needs of audiences and clients in the context for which they are intended.

The Music program at Wichita State University combines a well-rounded liberal arts education with quality musical training from professional faculty and opportunities to gain real-world experience, in venues big and small, on-campus and throughout Kansas’ center of arts and culture.

university: University of Europe for Applied Sciences
description: The Communication Design programme taught at University of Europe for Applied Sciences also include practical projects with top partners from the creative industry and optional field trips which will prepare you perfectly for your dream job.
The Music - Music Education major at Colorado State University prepares students for teaching choral, instrumental, and general music in elementary and secondary schools.

course: Audio and Music Technology (with Foundation Year) (Hons)
university: University of the West of England (UWE Bristol)
description: This Audio and Music Technology (with Foundation Year) (Hons) at University of the West of England (UWE Bristol) is ideal if you're passionate about music and the technology behind it, but don't necessarily have formal musical training or prior technical experience.

Do you want to use visual communication to make a difference in the world? Then this is the right degree for you. The Visual Communication and Change programme from Linnaeus University combines creative practices, visual art, and graphic design with knowledge of sustainability to prepare you for a profession as a visual communicator with a diverse set of graphic and conceptual tools.

This practical and intensive Practical Filmmaking course from MetFilm School Berlin is for students interested in exploring a career in film, television or online media before committing to a longer course.

This one-year (3 term) Media Production - International Foundation Programme from ONCAMPUS Coventry can offer successful students progression to Coventry University. You will study your Foundation programme at our state-of-the-art Centre located at the heart of the Coventry University campus.
The Fine Arts - Art History programme from Marist College  is offered on our Poughkeepsie campus with a concentration in either:Art History or Studio Art.
The Art - Photo Image Making major at Colorado State University enables students to explore artistic, personally-driven aspects of the photographic medium.

This Interior Design (Residential) course at Torrens University Australia is for designers who want to develop the skills and creativity to respond and adapt to the challenges of sustainable residential design in the 21st Century. You’ll be designing interiors in housing of all types: houses surrounded by gardens, high-rise living, mobile, multi-purpose and homes in adaptive reuse environments.

Humber College’s Cabinet Making certificate program, located at the Humber Centre for Trades & Technology, provides you with the knowledge and skills to construct and install basic cabinets, as well as build traditional furniture using recognized trade practices.

One of the main educational aims of the Dance programme offered by University of Nicosia is to provide intellectually and creatively challenging courses which fulfill the personal development of students and are founded on scholarship, artistry and research.

The Performance - Guitar Emphasis program from University of Arizona trains students for careers as professional musicians -- performers in classical or jazz music, and composers. After completing the basic curriculum, the student chooses an area of specialization.
Humber College’s Design Foundation certificate program provides you with the skills to focus your creativity as you begin your education in design.

course: Media Studies and Production - Film and Television Concentration
description: The Media Studies and Production - Film and Television Concentration from Marist College  provides a balance between the study of film and television and the practice of production for a wide range of media careers, including writing, producing, performance, and media criticism. .

This diploma in Interior Design and Decoration from Torrens University Australia will you lead into entry level roles in the industry, or you can continue your interior design and decoration studies at Bachelor level.

The Art - Drawing major at Colorado State University includes a solid foundation in the basics of drawing, plus a strong emphasis on the advanced development of drawing as an art form in its own right.
The Musical Theatre program is offered by University of Arizona.

This one-year (3 term) Architectural Technology - Undergraduate Foundation Programme from ONCAMPUS London South Bank offers successful students guaranteed progression to London South Bank University. You will study your Foundation programme at our Centre located at the heart of the London South Bank University campus.
Immerse yourself in a world where art, media and games join forces to deliver one of the most distinguished Computer Arts (Hons) degrees in Europe at Abertay University.

The goal of this Music - Performance - Orchestral Instrument major at Colorado State University is to prepare students to become highly skilled music educators, music therapists, performers, and composers.

The Music - Performance major at Colorado State University prepares students for potential professional careers in the music and creative industries as performers, entrepreneurs, and private music teachers. It also prepares students for continued study at the graduate level.

Industrial Engineering students at University of Arizona learn how to design and operate manufacturing and services systems. In addition to basic engineering, courses include mathematical and computer modeling and decision making.

university: University of Europe for Applied Sciences
description: In the Illustration bachelor's programme at the University of Applied Sciences Europe, you will learn exclusively from renowned lecturers from the creative industry and you can use the professional equipment of the University of Applied Sciences Europe for analogue and digital techniques for your study projects.

course: Audio and Music Technology (with Foundation Year) (Hons)
university: University of the West of England (UWE Bristol)
description: This Audio and Music Technology (with Foundation Year) (Hons) at University of the West of England (UWE Bristol) is ideal if you're passionate about music and the technology behind it, but don't necessarily have formal musical training or prior technical experience.

The Visual Communication and Change programme from Linnaeus University combines creative practices, visual art, and graphic design with knowledge of sustainability to prepare you for a profession as a visual communicator with a diverse set of graphic and conceptual tools.

This practical and intensive Practical Filmmaking course from MetFilm School Berlin is for students interested in exploring a career in film, television or online media before committing to a longer course.

This one-year (3 term) Media Production - International Foundation Programme from ONCAMPUS Coventry can offer successful students progression to Coventry University. You will study your Foundation programme at our state-of-the-art Centre located at the heart of the Coventry University campus.

The Art History program at Texas State University strives to establish a foundation of knowledge in the history of art and visual culture, its methodologies, and its active relationship to broader social and historical frameworks.
The Fine Arts - Art History programme from Marist College  is offered on our Poughkeepsie campus with a concentration in either:Art History or Studio Art.
The Art - Photo Image Making major at Colorado State University enables students to explore artistic, personally-driven aspects of the photographic medium.

This Interior Design (Residential) course at Torrens University Australia is for designers who want to develop the skills and creativity to respond and adapt to the challenges of sustainable residential design in the 21st Century. You’ll be designing interiors in housing of all types: houses surrounded by gardens, high-rise living, mobile, multi-purpose and homes in adaptive reuse environments.

Humber College’s Cabinet Making certificate program, located at the Humber Centre for Trades & Technology, provides you with the knowledge and skills to construct and install basic cabinets, as well as build traditional furniture using recognized trade practices.

One of the main educational aims of the Dance programme offered by University of Nicosia is to provide intellectually and creatively challenging courses which fulfill the personal development of students and are founded on scholarship, artistry and research.

The Performance - Guitar Emphasis program from University of Arizona trains students for careers as professional musicians -- performers in classical or jazz music, and composers. After completing the basic curriculum, the student chooses an area of specialization.

The Arts, Technology and Entertainment program from  Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University is an equal collaboration between the University and its industry partner, China Culture and Media Group, at the School of Cultural Technology in XJTLU Entrepreneur College (Taicang).

course: Film and Theatre - Undergraduate Foundation Programme
description: This Film and Theatre - Undergraduate Foundation Programme from ONCAMPUS Reading is designed to prepare international students, who have completed senior secondary education, for entry to undergraduate studies at the University of Reading.
Commercial Music (Hons) at Bath Spa University is a four year course for songwriters, producers and performers who want to turn their passion into a career.
The Musicology - Ethnomusicology program at Portland State University will give you a strong music foundation with an emphasis on musicology.

Study an Interior Architecture and Design (Hons) B.A. validated programme at Marbella Design Academy, with classes held in English in sunny Spain, and be awarded an official Bachelor of Arts with Honours degree in Interior Architecture & Design by our UK partner, the University of Bedfordshire.

university: School of Humanities and Social Sciences
description: One of the main aims of the Fine Art programme from University of Nicosia is to enable students to develop a personalised vision in relation to their practice and to be able to work collaboratively with others, in the current system of contemporary art, which focuses on collaborative and collective practices.

university: University of Europe for Applied Sciences
description: UE’s practice-oriented Film + Motion Design programme teaches and tests basic methods, concepts and techniques for the design of time-based media. Film + Motion Design is available at University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

university: School of Humanities and Social Sciences
description: The Architecture programme from University of Nicosia provides students with a comprehensive set of skills to prepare them for a career in Architecture.

course: Computer Games Development - Undergraduate Foundation Programme
description: This one-year (3 term) Computer Games Development - Undergraduate Foundation Programme from ONCAMPUS UK North offers successful students guaranteed progression to UCLan and the opportunity to apply to a number of other top UK universities through the UCAS process. You will study your Foundation programme at our Centre located at the heart of the UCLan campus.

The Product Design (Hons) course at Teesside University  allows you to develop your career in a multitude of directions, either as designer-makers or as designers for large organisations. 21st-century approaches to product design range from designing one-off, bespoke artefacts to mass-produced objects in their millions.

location: New York City, New York, United States
description: Achieve success in a wide range of career paths such as public policy, leisure businesses, museums, education, editing, journalism, biomedicine, law, criminology, and forensics with our BA in Film and Screen Studies at Pace University.
The goal of this Music - Performance - String Pedagogy major at Colorado State University is to prepare students to become highly skilled music educators, music therapists, performers, and composers.

course: Communication (Media Arts and Production) - International Studies
description: This combined Bachelor degrees in Communication (Media Arts and Production) - International Studies at the University of Technology Sydney combine a professional degree with immersion in another language and culture, enhancing professional training and career options.
The Audio Production program at Wichita State University combines your creativity with the skills needed for your dream career in the video game, film or recording industry.

The Industrial Design program from Humber College is project-based. Skills development is emphasized in years 1 and 2 and include visual presentation (manual and digital techniques), model making and computer-aided design (CAD).

The Art degree from Kansas State University is a professionally oriented undergraduate degree in art. It is designed primarily for those planning to become professional artists, artist-teachers, or art therapists. Greater emphasis is placed on actual practice in the creative art disciplines.

The School of Music is committed to excellence in music teaching and learning for all students at Texas State. As a unit within Texas State, we provide a liberal education with emphasis on cultural values by offering special course work in the arts and humanities. Enroll now in the Performance - Guitar Concentration at Texas State University!
